page.title: 12LEISURE ACTIVITIES / CLUBS
page.content: HOLDENBY HAS A MEMBERSHIP OF ONLY SEVEN LADIES IN THE WOMENS INSTITUTE. ANYONE INTERESTED IN ANY DAY CLASSES, EVENING CLASSES OR CLUBS, GO EITHER TO SPRATTON OR BRAMPTON. SPRATTON HAS A LARGER MEMBERSHIP OF THE WOMENS INSTITUTE AROUND TWENTY FIVE MEMBERS. THEY HAVE A PRE SCHOOL PLAY GROUP, PLUS A MOTHERS AND TODDLERS CLUB. THERE IS A CHOICE OF SEVERAL EVENING CLASSES,CONSISTING OF KEEP FIT, YOGA, LOCAL HISTORY AND FLOWER ARRANGING. FOR THE YOUNGER ELEMENT OF THE VILLAGE THERE ARE SEVERAL ORGANISATIONS TO CHOOSE FROM, MERRY COMRADES, WHO RAISE MONEY FOR LOCAL CHARITIES, BROWNIES, GUIDES AND CUBS RUN BY THE CHURCH. THERE IS A FOOTBALL TEAM, WHICH HAS ITS OWN GROUND AND CLUBHOUSE.LAST BUT NOT LEAST THERE IS A CONSERVATIVE CLUB.
